DOC.brief_summary: This is a safety and efficacy study of LiRIS® in females with interstitial cystitis with Hunner's lesions.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of LiRIS® in Females With Interstitial Cystitis With Hunner's Lesions
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of interstitial cystitis with Hunner's lesions/ulcers Previous treatment with LiRIS® Interstitial cystitis/bladder pain syndrome, without Hunner's lesions/ulcers
